mcp_enforcement.description: Policy enforcement system - validators are mocked, no real execution

mcp_service.description: Main tool service - has some real file operations but limited

utility_tools.description: Utility tools - fully working (calculate, hash, etc.)

execution_gaps.no_real_filesystem: Tools don't actually read/write to real filesystem
execution_gaps.no_linting: Linting is basic pattern matching, not real ESLint
execution_gaps.no_type_checking: Type checking is basic pattern matching, not real tsc

required_capabilities: Shell command execution with output capture
Real code analysis (AST parsing, type checking)
